column1: #Text=Zuko says : " Tell me , if you could have anything you want right now , what would it be ? "
#Text=Mai says : " Hm ... A big fancy fruit tart , with rose petals on top . "
#Text=Zuko says : " You know , being a prince and all , I might just be able to make that happen . "
#Text=Zuko says : " Do you think you could find a fresh fruit tart for the lady , with rose petals on top ? "
#Text=Mai says : " I guess there 's some nice perks that come with being royalty .
#Text=I - I assumed you were going , too .
#Text=" Zuko says : " I guess I was n't invited .
